wicked.translation[0].definitions[0].def: behaving in a way that is morally wrong
wicked.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the wicked stepmother in ‘Hansel and Gretel’
wicked.translation[0].definitions[1].def: behaving badly in a way that is amusing
wicked.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Carl had a wicked grin on his face as he crept up behind Ellen.
Tara hasn’t lost her wicked sense of humour.
